page.title: 11THE NEWSAGENTS
page.content: Catts is just down the road from our Restaurant it is a Newsagents. It is right in the middle of the High Street and I get the Friday Ad. and my dad's paper from there every day. They sell toys, comics, drinks, models, writing pads, pencils, erasers and cards, and I get my sweets there after school. It is not a very big shop and it is being re-decorated at the moment. The people are very nice and in the new year other people are coming from Turkey to take over the shop. The shop is to become a mini- market. It is a cosy place to shop and there are lots of sweets to choose from. At Christmas time you can buy cards to send to your friends and you could buy them small gifts.
